AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraph1: I'm Stefano a Spanish native speaker. That actually work for Infragistics in English.
AboutMe.Paragraph2: This is my first time working in another language, this may be challenging at first, but an enjoyable challenge.
AboutMe.Paragraph4: On Infragistics been on the role of full-stack developer, I'm mostly focused on front end task.
AboutMe.Paragraph5: Neither way, also contribute on the back end, and doing some tasks on salesforce CRM.
